nodes.text: Ardo Banch was a human male who served as a lieutenant in the Galactic Empire, stationed on the desert planet Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. When the Sith Lord Darth Vader searched for his son, Luke Skywalker, he visited Banch on Tatooine in order to access records and find the location of Skywalker's home. Banch attempted to inform Vader of transmissions he had picked up, but a criminal gang attacked the Imperial forces, killing Banch.

Ardo Banch was an Imperial officer loyal to the Galactic Empire. Well-mannered, Banch warmly received the Sith Lord Darth Vader and offered all assistance possible to the Empire's enforcer, doing his best to avoid getting killed by the fearsome Dark Lord of the Sith.
